nodes.text: Bakk and Zico was an alien who hosted a broadcast of the final podrace of The Rawani Cup from the city of Baroonda. The broadcast was played on radio station BSO 401.72 in Black Spire Outpost on the planet Batuu during the war between the First Order and the Resistance.
Zakk and Zico was created for Star Wars: Galaxy's Edge, which opened to guests at Disneyland Park on May 31, 2019. The alien is not present in the park, but its voice can be heard in certain areas.
